DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of the study is to compare the mean AERP between treatment groups based on the hypothesis that in subjects with paroxysmal AF, Irbesartan prevents electrophysiological remodeling resulting in a prolonged atrial effective refractory period relative (AERP) to placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Electrophysiological Effects of Irbesartan in Patients With Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation (AF)
DOC.criteria: Recurrent PAF with indication for catheter ablation Struct. Cardiopathy Mitral valve disease VEF<40% Myocardiopathy LVH cardiac surgery AF reversible QT c>450 Recent MI/stroke, severe HTN Requirement of ACEI/ARBs Coronary synd., HTA, liver disease
